Hotel_Name: Maison Albar H tel Paris Champs Elys es ex Mac Mahon
Negative_Review: Our stay was great and the hotel staff were very accommodating
Positive_Review: Our initial room was tiny and we payed extra and upgraded to the executive suite which was lovely The staff were helpful and accommodating The location was excellent and central The view from of room was amazing The bed was comfortable and croissants were good too

Hotel_Name: Maison Albar H tel Paris Champs Elys es ex Mac Mahon
Negative_Review: No Negative
Positive_Review: Location is perfect Super super super close to Arc de Triomphe A lot of restaurants around this property The staffs in this hotel are extremely nice and professional The breakfast is various and delicious The hotel is clean Everything is amazing I will definitely stay in this hotel next time

Hotel_Name: Maison Albar H tel Paris Champs Elys es ex Mac Mahon
Negative_Review: No hospitality no Aircon working breakfast very poor small extremely small Not 5 star at all No value for money Will not recommend anyone to stay here

Hotel_Name: Maison Albar H tel Paris Champs Elys es ex Mac Mahon
Negative_Review: It s definitely not a proper 5 star hotel Not organised with regards to room cleaning 3 cleaners walked into the room within a span of one hour without knocking Furthermore no one helped with the baggage during check out They have a day tax of approx 7 euro which must be payed in cash Personally I think it s to evade taxes when hotels request for cash to be paid The front desk staff were friendly The shower drainage was not sufficient and would fill up during a shower I suppose coming from the middle east the hotel standards are very high and as a result most European hotels can t compare You need to lower your expectations
Positive_Review: Location and the toilet is quite fancy and high tech which is cool

Hotel_Name: Maison Albar H tel Paris Champs Elys es ex Mac Mahon
Negative_Review: the public computer was an Apple and I could not figure out how to use it The maid would remove service items from my room like a pillow or washcloth or bath mat etc I do not know why
Positive_Review: excellent service from most of the staff

Hotel_Name: Maison Albar H tel Paris Champs Elys es ex Mac Mahon
Negative_Review: No separation between shower and toilet so the entire bathroom got soaked whilst Having a shower
Positive_Review: Beautifully decorated hotel room and really friendly staff Great location with a view of arc de triomphe and right next to champs elysees

Hotel_Name: Maison Albar H tel Paris Champs Elys es ex Mac Mahon
Negative_Review: The only thing I didn t like was that I paid for the property well in advance then lost my credit card due to the hotel policy I had to pay again with my new credit card and they would refund me my original payment However I have now been waiting over 3 weeks for the refund and have had no email back from the hotel

Hotel_Name: Maison Albar H tel Paris Champs Elys es ex Mac Mahon
Negative_Review: Please stop coming and checking if everything is ok every afternoon evening We just want to chill sleep and not answer the door
Positive_Review: Super comfy bed Reasonable sized room Coffee making facility Superb location

Hotel_Name: Maison Albar H tel Paris Champs Elys es ex Mac Mahon
Negative_Review: The staff were awful Bartender refused to serve me a Gin and tonic stating she had to cook a meal for another customer first There was no one else in the bar The time she took to say she couldn t pour a simple drink was longer than the act of pouring would have taken Utterly disgusting The room safe didn t work and they couldn t fix it I wasn t asked about my stay when I checked out They failed to order me a cab when asked and after 15 minutes I had to ask again Dreadful dreadful dreadful Avoid
Positive_Review: Excellent quality of fittings and fixtures Room safe didn t work and they couldn t fix it

Hotel_Name: Maison Albar H tel Paris Champs Elys es ex Mac Mahon
Negative_Review: nothing to not like
Positive_Review: The staff were great the overall cleanliness of the hotel was out standing the room was excellent Great location easy access to Metro arch de Triomphe Champs lys es and rest of City A

Hotel_Name: Maison Albar H tel Paris Champs Elys es ex Mac Mahon
Negative_Review: See above comments
Positive_Review: This doesn t deserve to be a 5 star hotel better a 4 star Poor facilities and cramp everywhere The hot water was cold in the shower and the pressure was like when I pass urine Same pressure Overall poor facilities

Hotel_Name: Maison Albar H tel Paris Champs Elys es ex Mac Mahon
Negative_Review: personal I have made the reservation and paid the total money by master card on internet 2 weeks before my travel and I thought everything was ok But just because i did not had my card with me they would not give me the room they demand I pay cash and then they told me that If I choose to change to another hotel they will use my card information and take the total money from my account Too much stress They have really destroyed my trip How can it be possible that they could use the card if I changed the hotel but they would not use the card when I stayed at the hotel I went to Paris to shop but I could not do that because I have to pay the hotel cash and I did not have my card with me

Hotel_Name: Maison Albar H tel Paris Champs Elys es ex Mac Mahon
Negative_Review: not a professional staff and not friendly at all no refill to the coffee stand there is no early check in and late checkouts

Hotel_Name: Maison Albar H tel Paris Champs Elys es ex Mac Mahon
Negative_Review: Everything in the room and hotel is too small and the breakfast is nice but very restrictive
Positive_Review: The location and viewing l arc de triumph right from our window We were also upgraded to a better room for free

Hotel_Name: Maison Albar H tel Paris Champs Elys es ex Mac Mahon
Negative_Review: The superior room is too small compared to the pictures of the same standing Two doors to access the bathroom Lighting is not easy to find A shower instead of a bath in a superior room

Hotel_Name: Maison Albar H tel Paris Champs Elys es ex Mac Mahon
Negative_Review: No Negative
Positive_Review: The hotel staff were outstanding and very accommodating and made this a memorable trip as I has very specific requirements for my room post proposal to my fiance Prior to the trip I liaised with staff via email who planned everything out with me and offered special deals On site Alex from the front desk managed the entire booking and upgraded our room to a suite with view of the Arc de Triomphe The best experience we ve had with a hotel we will definitely be returning to visit on our anniversaries and will be staying at the Maison Albar Hotel

Hotel_Name: Maison Albar H tel Paris Champs Elys es ex Mac Mahon
Negative_Review: Staff were unhelpful We booked a superior room and we had a box room on the top floor that felt like a prison it was covered In dust above the bed Phoned to complain about constant noise but staff did not care Felt like we were dealing with robots who were reading from scripts Ordered room service and did not come even after I called twice to see where our drinks were her reply was my colleagues are busy but I ll ask again finally after three hours I phoned and got transferred to another person who got them within 5 minutes Poor service and overpriced

Hotel_Name: Maison Albar H tel Paris Champs Elys es ex Mac Mahon
Negative_Review: The most dissapointing trip ever The hotel has the most ridiculous and complicated procedures ever Prepare all the documents for that trip because you don t know what they may need They took the payment for the stay twice and took them 3 weeks to return it If I didn t get help from booking I don t know if I ever would get my money back The director was rude she ignored me and my emails It s a beautiful hotel and fantastic location but
Positive_Review: It s a great location very nice and clean interiors All the staff but the director very kind and friendly

Hotel_Name: Maison Albar H tel Paris Champs Elys es ex Mac Mahon
Negative_Review: They took money from 2 bank cards as payment then reversed one of them on departure Which doesn t become available in your account for up to 3 days they later told me This left me with very little money on my card I m only home today and still awaiting money to be reimbursed I m hoping it actually does and that we aren t out double payment for hotel

Hotel_Name: Maison Albar H tel Paris Champs Elys es ex Mac Mahon
Negative_Review: if you re at the back of the hotel the views aren t great
Positive_Review: Beautiful interior and location is literally a stones throw from the Arc de Triumphe Staff are nice too Highly recommend

Hotel_Name: Maison Albar H tel Paris Champs Elys es ex Mac Mahon
Negative_Review: The room is a little bit small which is not easy for me and my friend to put our big luggages Plus the drain is horrible When we taking shower the showering space is flood which is really annoyed
Positive_Review: The location is perfect close to the metro and bus stations We can visit many famous views easily Also the staffs here are really nice

Hotel_Name: Maison Albar H tel Paris Champs Elys es ex Mac Mahon
Negative_Review: The rooms are small the breakfast was not included even though with this rate
Positive_Review: Early check in frindely staff Location nearby coffees restaurants easy access to metro line 1 and also there is a grocery shop may be 300 meters walking distance

Hotel_Name: Maison Albar H tel Paris Champs Elys es ex Mac Mahon
Negative_Review: No Negative
Positive_Review: 2nd time Mac Mahon excellent staff and hotel Delivered a try of goodies for my birthday and they arrange a lot of the restaurants for us Will always go back

Hotel_Name: Maison Albar H tel Paris Champs Elys es ex Mac Mahon
Negative_Review: Nothing our trip was perfect Will definitely be back
Positive_Review: The staff were very friendly and accommodating the location was fantastic just a couple of hundred metres from the Arc de Triomphe Would recccomend to anyone

Hotel_Name: Maison Albar H tel Paris Champs Elys es ex Mac Mahon
Negative_Review: You were still busy with renovations which was not too intrusive but when finished the experience would even have been better
Positive_Review: The staff was very helpful and friendly Your body lotion and wash with the lemon verbena smell was the best of 8 hotels we visited in Italy and the Netherlands during this trip We loved the quirkiness of the decor

Hotel_Name: Maison Albar H tel Paris Champs Elys es ex Mac Mahon
Negative_Review: There was heavy construction works going on in the hotel from the early hours of Friday all throughout the day and from ver early on Monday morning This was very disrupting to us as it woke us up very early and was a source of constant irritation This should have been communicated before we booked as we would not have stayed here had we known We found this very disturbing The staff were clearly under huge pressure as they were receiving multiple complaints from staff and as a result not giving the customers good service

Hotel_Name: Maison Albar H tel Paris Champs Elys es ex Mac Mahon
Negative_Review: Nothing
Positive_Review: Staff are friendly rooms are really nice comfortable cozy clean specious and definitely the location Family room is well equipped with kitchint

Hotel_Name: Maison Albar H tel Paris Champs Elys es ex Mac Mahon
Negative_Review: Nite receptionist was not professional was not eager to help and focused on playing with computer not dressed in hotel uniform and drinking coffee from a small carton cup while talking with me Made hotel feel like a 2 star Also Rooms pillows where awful
Positive_Review: Room size was good receptionist at check was great

Hotel_Name: Maison Albar H tel Paris Champs Elys es ex Mac Mahon
Negative_Review: the staff the service the reception small entrance no soundproof no tv channels no english speakers no facilities
Positive_Review: the room was comfortable and the bathroom was luxurious

Hotel_Name: Maison Albar H tel Paris Champs Elys es ex Mac Mahon
Negative_Review: We were charged 150 Euros for damage we didn t cause to a mirror in the room We were not even questioned by the hotel our card was just charged and invoice sent which was disappointing and upsetting We spent over 100 Euro in phone calls following up to ensure they understood it was not any of our doing and the mirror was cracked when we arrived So long as this doesn t happen again we would 100 stay there again the hotel was stunning and a great location
Positive_Review: Everything was wonderful Great location great staff wonderful and interesting decor

Hotel_Name: Maison Albar H tel Paris Champs Elys es ex Mac Mahon
Negative_Review: No welcome drinks for genius client on booking com the reception is too small and the attitude of the stuff is bad I think it is a 3 star hotel or less

Hotel_Name: Maison Albar H tel Paris Champs Elys es ex Mac Mahon
Negative_Review: View wasn t great but they combat this with a TV channel that has a live feed over the city It s to be expected with city centre hotels Wouldn t put me off staying again
Positive_Review: The hotel was fantastic Could not have asked for more Staff were great made us feel very comfortable Nothing was too much trouble Room was really trendy and well kept Shower was of a good size and really easy to use

Hotel_Name: Maison Albar H tel Paris Champs Elys es ex Mac Mahon
Negative_Review: The dark decor is a bit morose It is certainly not five star quality in terms of place or serice
Positive_Review: The ongoing renovation makes the lobby most unattractive in fact there is hardly any space left to enter exit the hotel

Hotel_Name: Maison Albar H tel Paris Champs Elys es ex Mac Mahon
Negative_Review: i didn t like it at all very small rooms very small toilets very noisy a lot of maintenance and noise from the early morning i dont know how its rated 5 stars

Hotel_Name: Maison Albar H tel Paris Champs Elys es ex Mac Mahon
Negative_Review: This was not a 5 star hotel by any means They do not have a concierge They do not have a lobby only a hallway with a desk They do not clean your room unless you ask They do not give you shampoo and conditioner unless you ask They do not have irons in the rooms They do not have luggage racks in the rooms These are all staples of a 5 star hotel which they claim to be On top of all of that they have construction going on The hotel was not remotely close to being full and they wanted to put us directly over the construction We had to ask to be someplace higher above it and the best they could do is move us up to two floors above the construction This is not a 5 star hotel experience Stay away
Positive_Review: The location was good and the shower was nice

Hotel_Name: Maison Albar H tel Paris Champs Elys es ex Mac Mahon
Negative_Review: The sound proofing of the room could have been better both towards the other rooms and to the street
Positive_Review: Excellent location nice design of the room and the entire hotel

Hotel_Name: Maison Albar H tel Paris Champs Elys es ex Mac Mahon
Negative_Review: The hotel is quiet small as it is in very small building Room was super small Cleanliness is average
Positive_Review: Actually i really like the location Room was super small and but the interior design was nice Cleanliness is average as i am very hygene person i pay a lot of attention in the room Staff was welcoming Breakfast was good If i stay there again it would be definately for the location not for anything else

Hotel_Name: Maison Albar H tel Paris Champs Elys es ex Mac Mahon
Negative_Review: Breakfast too expensive We didn t eat at the hotel
Positive_Review: Location was excellent Staff were extremely helpful and courteous to us Nothing was too much bother any member of staff Room was beautiful enjoyed the welcome package from Booking com

Hotel_Name: Maison Albar H tel Paris Champs Elys es ex Mac Mahon
Negative_Review: No Negative
Positive_Review: The staff were so friendly and when we rang the front desk for extra coffee pods and bathroom bits they were more than happy to help Super big extremely comfortable bed Lovely room

Hotel_Name: Maison Albar H tel Paris Champs Elys es ex Mac Mahon
Negative_Review: A lot of noise due to renovation that should be compensated to client with better price On ne peut avoir le beurre et l argent du beurre

Hotel_Name: Maison Albar H tel Paris Champs Elys es ex Mac Mahon
Negative_Review: I don t quite understand why it s given a rating of 5 stars with no gym no swimming pool and the breakfast choice and quality were poor Restaurant staff not attentive
Positive_Review: The location was great The rooms decorated in a nice fashion Reception staff friendly and helpful

Hotel_Name: Maison Albar H tel Paris Champs Elys es ex Mac Mahon
Negative_Review: No Negative
Positive_Review: Perfect location next to Arc de Triomph and the CDG Etoille metro station The room was elegant cosy big quiet and luxurious egyptian cotton quin size bed marble japanese toilet build in closet bathtub lux toiletries Delicious breakfast helpful staff I would like to especially thank Stephanie for her help arranging all the necessary tickets and accomodating my needs The whole atmosphere in the hotel elicits elegance luxury decadence and romance The hotel made my first time in Paris tottally magical Thank you

Hotel_Name: Maison Albar H tel Paris Champs Elys es ex Mac Mahon
Negative_Review: No Negative
Positive_Review: Beautiful gem of a hotel right beside the Arc du Triumph Staff were lovely Rooms are fantastic and price was perfect Highly recommend this lovely property

Hotel_Name: Maison Albar H tel Paris Champs Elys es ex Mac Mahon
Negative_Review: Not much to fault on a hotel of this size
Positive_Review: The general furnishes of the hotel were great the staff were very friendly and accomodating They added some extra touches as it was our first wedding anniversary which was great as I was not expecting anything Location was very central and most points of interest in walking distance Would recommend this hotel to anyone A

Hotel_Name: Maison Albar H tel Paris Champs Elys es ex Mac Mahon
Negative_Review: For 5 star hotel it not what I expected Small lobby bar was not well staffed missing good restaurant and over all it just seemed something missing for 5 star rated hotel And the toilet in my room is the smallest I have seen Hard to have comfortable seat Not sure about other room
Positive_Review: It well made up hotel decor good staff seemed friendly OK hotel in good location

Hotel_Name: Maison Albar H tel Paris Champs Elys es ex Mac Mahon
Negative_Review: double bed is two single gathered we feel the hole line between them kind discomfort
Positive_Review: As usual everything is fine from the nougats to staff location finally the wifi got better than before

Hotel_Name: Maison Albar H tel Paris Champs Elys es ex Mac Mahon
Negative_Review: Carpet dirty towels old and hard in texture ditto bathrobe Room tiny and no room to get ready for two people Desk cluttered with coffee machine and lamp No room for any personal items No space around the bed to get in out or around No kettle Only three coffee pods for two people for 24 hours Hairdryer fixed to wall in bathroom and had to hold button down to keep it on No one else could use bathroom if dryer in use Bathroom tiny and products second rate We were sold this room as a 5 star hotel and it isn t in any way Staff sullen and no one asked if we had enjoyed our stay at end
Positive_Review: Location of building and nothing else

Hotel_Name: Maison Albar H tel Paris Champs Elys es ex Mac Mahon
Negative_Review: The lady who gives the room service washes the glases directly with dirty hands after cleaning W C
Positive_Review: Best location best restaurants friendly staff of hotel

Hotel_Name: Maison Albar H tel Paris Champs Elys es ex Mac Mahon
Negative_Review: Was expecting a five star hotel with a superior room to be much bigger The reception too small no lobby to sit

Hotel_Name: Maison Albar H tel Paris Champs Elys es ex Mac Mahon
